messages.title: Tory axe hangs over Darlington school rebuilding programme
messages.content: The Conservative Shadow Minister for Schools has admitted that, if the Conservatives win the next General Election, the £57million which Darlington has been awarded to rebuild Longfield, Branksome and Hurworth Schools could be axed.

messages.title: Our NHS at risk with the Conservatives
messages.content: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS. David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a three horse race in Darlington! With so many voters deserting Labour in favour of the Lib Dems, anyone can win!

issues.education: The Conservative Shadow Minister for Schools has admitted that, if the Conservatives win the next General Election, the £57million which Darlington has been awarded to rebuild Longfield, Branksome and Hurworth Schools could be axed.
issues.health: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS. David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners.
